abstract: Yum’s China business and the remainder are already effectively separate. The catch is that the American unit will still share Chinese growth risks.
snippet: Yum’s China business and the remainder are already effectively separate. The catch is that the American unit will still share Chinese growth risks.
lead_paragraph: First comes the gratification, then the remorse. But does the cycle familiar to Yum Brands customers also apply to its investors?

headline.main: Why the Yum Brands Split Makes Sense
